info.title: Gram API Description
info.description: Gram is the tools platform for AI agents

post.description:
MCP server endpoint for a toolset.

**Required security scopes for apikey**:
  * `consumer`

**Required security scopes for project_slug**:
  * `consumer`

parameters.name: toolset
parameters.description: The toolset to access via MCP.

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: The environment to access via MCP.

get.description: Serve an image from Gram.

parameters.description: The ID of the asset to serve
parameters.name: id

post.description:
Upload an image to Gram.

**Required security scopes for apikey**:
  * `producer`

**Required security scopes for project_slug**:
  * `producer`

Upload an OpenAPI v3 document to Gram.

**Required security scopes for apikey**:
  * `producer`

**Required security scopes for project_slug**:
  * `producer`

post.description:
Create a deployment to load tool definitions.

**Required security scopes for apikey**:
  * `producer`

**Required security scopes for project_slug**:
  * `producer`

parameters.description: A unique identifier that will mitigate against duplicate deployments.
parameters.name: Idempotency-Key

post.description:
Create a new deployment with additional or updated tool sources.

**Required security scopes for apikey**:
  * `producer`

**Required security scopes for project_slug**:
  * `producer`

Get a deployment by its ID.

**Required security scopes for apikey**:

**Required security scopes for project_slug**:

**Required security scopes for apikey**:
  * `producer`

**Required security scopes for project_slug**:
  * `producer`

List all deployments in descending order of creation.

**Required security scopes for apikey**:
  * `producer`

**Required security scopes for project_slug**:
  * `producer`

version.example: Alias sequi praesentium deserunt eveniet et.

example.name: Aut nesciunt veritatis voluptates.

asset_id.description: The ID of the uploaded asset.

name.description: The name to give the document as it will be displayed in UIs.

slug.description: The slug to give the document as it will be displayed in URLs.

example.asset_id: Repudiandae porro veniam modi magni non.
example.name: Consequatur tenetur necessitatibus id est unde voluptate.

name.description: The name of the package to add.

version.description: The version of the package to add. If omitted, the latest version will be used.
version.example: Expedita quae unde ab omnis similique et.

example.name: Quae facere eos.
example.version: Culpa dolor quam voluptas sed.

content_length.description: The content length of the asset

content_type.description: The content type of the asset
content_type.example: Repellat sed quia sed quas excepturi rerum.

created_at.description: The creation date of the asset.

id.description: The ID of the asset

sha256.description: The SHA256 hash of the asset
sha256.example: Blanditiis eos laboriosam eum nobis laudantium nam.

updated_at.description: The last update date of the asset.
